section.heading: Short title. This Act may be called the Legislative Assembly of

section.heading: Change in representation in the Legislative Assembly of

content.p: Nagaland. For the period referred to in clause (2) of article 371A of the Constitution, the total number of seats allotted to the

blockList.listIntroduction: Legislative Assembly of Nagaland shall be increased from forty- six to fifty- two, of which-

item.p: the seats allocated to the Tuensang district shall be increased from six to twelve and shall be filled by persons chosen by the members of the regional council, referred to in that article, from amongst themselves in such manner as the

blockList.listIntroduction: Governor of Nagaland, after consulting that council may, by notification in the Official Gazette, specify, and

item.p: the remaining forty seats shall be filled by persons chosen by direct election from assembly constituencies in the rest of the State of Nagaland.
